##############################
# United States Election Events
##############################
# Made by jespertjee and Yard1
##############################

add_namespace = usa.election.1936

###PRE-ELECTION EVENTS###

country_event = {
	id = usa.election.1936.1
	title = usa.election.1936.1.t
	desc = usa.election.1936.1.d
	picture = congress

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 3 }

	trigger = {
		tag = USA
		date > 1936.06.15
	}

	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_choice value = 1 }
		set_country_flag = { flag = USA_roosevelt_choice value = 1 }
		set_country_flag = USA_election_started
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.1.a
		set_country_flag = USA_landon
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.1.b
		set_country_flag = USA_roosevelt
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = usa.election.1936.2
	title = usa.election.1936.2.t
	desc = usa.election.1936.2.d
	picture = congress

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 3 }

	trigger = {
		tag = USA
		date > 1936.06.28
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = { flag = USA_garner_choice value = 1 }
		set_country_flag = { flag = USA_long_choice value = 1 }
	}

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.2.a
		set_country_flag = USA_garner
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.2.b
		set_country_flag = USA_long
	}
}

### landon events ###

country_event = {
	id = usa.election.1936.3
	title = usa.election.1936.3.t
	desc = usa.election.1936.3.d
	picture = congress

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 3 }

	trigger = {
		tag = USA
		has_country_flag = USA_landon
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.3.a
		set_country_flag = USA_landon_west
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.3.b
		set_country_flag = USA_landon_north_central
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.3.c
		set_country_flag = USA_landon_southeast
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.3.e
		set_country_flag = USA_landon_northeast
	}
}

## West ##

country_event = {
	id = usa.election.1936.4
	title = usa.election.1936.4.t
	desc = usa.election.1936.4.d
	picture = california

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 5 }

	trigger = {
		tag = USA
		has_country_flag = USA_landon_west
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.4.a
		set_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_west_poor value = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_choice value > 1 }
					}
				}
			country_event = { id = usa.election.1936.8 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_choice value > 1 }
				}
			set_country_flag = USA_election_1936_started
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.4.b
		set_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_west_middle value = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_choice value > 1 }
					}
				}
			country_event = { id = usa.election.1936.8 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_choice value > 1 }
				}
			set_country_flag = USA_election_1936_started
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.4.c
		set_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_california_rich value = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_choice value > 1 }
					}
				}
			country_event = { id = usa.election.1936.8 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_choice value > 1 }
				}
			set_country_flag = USA_election_1936_started
			}
		}
	}
}

## North Central ##

country_event = {
	id = usa.election.1936.5
	title = usa.election.1936.5.t
	desc = usa.election.1936.5.d
	picture = congress

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 5 }

	trigger = {
		tag = USA
		has_country_flag = USA_landon_north_central
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.5.a
		set_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_north_central_poor value = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_choice value > 1 }
					}
				}
			country_event = { id = usa.election.1936.8 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_choice value > 1 }
				}
			set_country_flag = USA_election_1936_started
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.5.b
		set_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_north_central_middle value = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_choice value > 1 }
					}
				}
			country_event = { id = usa.election.1936.8 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_choice value > 1 }
				}
			set_country_flag = USA_election_1936_started
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.5.c
		set_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_north_central_rich value = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_choice value > 1 }
					}
				}
			country_event = { id = usa.election.1936.8 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_choice value > 1 }
				}
			set_country_flag = USA_election_1936_started
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = usa.election.1936.6
	title = usa.election.1936.6.t
	desc = usa.election.1936.6.d
	picture = congress

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 5 }

	trigger = {
		tag = USA
		has_country_flag = USA_landon_southeast
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.6.a
		set_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_southeast_poor value = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {

						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_choice value > 1 }
					}

	id = usa.election.1936.7
	title = usa.election.1936.7.t
	desc = usa.election.1936.7.d
	picture = congress

		tag = USA
		has_country_flag = USA_landon_northeast
	}

		ai_chance = {
			base = 10

## landon new state ##

country_event = {
	id = usa.election.1936.8
	title = usa.election.1936.8.t
	desc = usa.election.1936.8.d
	picture = congress

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_choice value = 1 }
	}

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		trigger = {
				USA = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = USA_landon_west
						}
					}
			}
		name = usa.election.1936.8.a
		set_country_flag = USA_landon_west
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		trigger = {
				USA = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = USA_landon_north_central
						}
					}
			}
		name = usa.election.1936.8.b
		set_country_flag = USA_landon_north_central
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		trigger = {
				USA = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = USA_landon_southeast
						}
					}
			}
		name = usa.election.1936.8.c
		set_country_flag = USA_landon_southeast
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		trigger = {
				USA = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = USA_landon_northeast
						}
					}
			}

		name = usa.election.1936.8.e
		set_country_flag = USA_landon_northeast
	}
}

### roosevelt events ###

country_event = {
	id = usa.election.1936.9
	title = usa.election.1936.9.t
	desc = usa.election.1936.9.d
	picture = congress

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 3 }

	trigger = {
		tag = USA
		has_country_flag = USA_roosevelt
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.9.a
		set_country_flag = USA_roosevelt_west
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.9.b
		set_country_flag = USA_roosevelt_north_central
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.9.c
		set_country_flag = USA_roosevelt_southeast
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.9.e
		set_country_flag = USA_roosevelt_northeast
	}
}

## West ##

country_event = {
	id = usa.election.1936.10
	title = usa.election.1936.10.t
	desc = usa.election.1936.10.d
	picture = california

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 5 }

	trigger = {
		tag = USA
		has_country_flag = USA_roosevelt_west
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.10.a
		set_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_west_poor value = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_roosevelt_choice value > 1 }
					}
				}
			country_event = { id = usa.election.1936.14 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_roosevelt_choice value > 1 }
				}
			set_country_flag = USA_election_1936_started
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.10.b
		set_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_west_middle value = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_roosevelt_choice value > 1 }
					}
				}
			country_event = { id = usa.election.1936.14 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_roosevelt_choice value > 1 }
				}
			set_country_flag = USA_election_1936_started
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.10.c
		set_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_west_rich value = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_roosevelt_choice value > 1 }
					}
				}
			country_event = { id = usa.election.1936.14 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_roosevelt_choice value > 1 }
				}
			set_country_flag = USA_election_1936_started
			}
		}
	}
}

## North Central ##

country_event = {
	id = usa.election.1936.11
	title = usa.election.1936.11.t
	desc = usa.election.1936.11.d
	picture = congress

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 5 }

	trigger = {
		tag = USA
		has_country_flag = USA_roosevelt_north_central
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.11.a
		set_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_north_central_poor value = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_roosevelt_choice value > 1 }
					}
				}
			country_event = { id = usa.election.1936.14 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_roosevelt_choice value > 1 }
				}
			set_country_flag = USA_election_1936_started
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.11.b
		set_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_north_central_middle value = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {

						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_roosevelt_choice value > 1 }

			}

				}
			set_country_flag = USA_election_1936_started
			}
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = usa.election.1936.13
	title = usa.election.1936.13.t
	desc = usa.election.1936.13.d
	picture = congress

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 5 }

	trigger = {
		tag = USA
		has_country_flag = USA_roosevelt_northeast
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.13.a
		set_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_northeast_poor value = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_roosevelt_choice value > 1 }
					}
				}
			country_event = { id = usa.election.1936.14 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_roosevelt_choice value > 1 }
				}
			set_country_flag = USA_election_1936_started
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.13.b
		set_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_northeast_middle value = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_roosevelt_choice value > 1 }
					}
				}
			country_event = { id = usa.election.1936.14 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_roosevelt_choice value > 1 }
				}
			set_country_flag = USA_election_1936_started
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.13.c
		set_country_flag = { flag = USA_landon_northeast_rich value = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_roosevelt_choice value > 1 }
					}
				}
			country_event = { id = usa.election.1936.14 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_roosevelt_choice value > 1 }
				}
			set_country_flag = USA_election_1936_started
			}
		}
	}

## roosevelt new state ##

country_event = {
	id = usa.election.1936.14
	title = usa.election.1936.14.t
	desc = usa.election.1936.14.d
	picture = congress

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_roosevelt_choice value = 1 }
	}

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		trigger = {
				USA = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = USA_roosevelt_west
						}
					}
			}
		name = usa.election.1936.14.a
		set_country_flag = USA_roosevelt_west
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		trigger = {
				USA = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = USA_roosevelt_north_central
						}
					}
			}
		name = usa.election.1936.14.b
		set_country_flag = USA_roosevelt_north_central
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		trigger = {
				USA = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = USA_roosevelt_southeast
						}
					}
			}
		name = usa.election.1936.14.c
		set_country_flag = USA_roosevelt_southeast
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		trigger = {
				USA = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = USA_roosevelt_northeast
						}
					}
			}

		name = usa.election.1936.14.e
		set_country_flag = USA_roosevelt_northeast
	}
}

		tag = USA
		has_country_flag = USA_garner

			base = 50
		}

## West ##

country_event = {
	id = usa.election.1936.16
	title = usa.election.1936.16.t
	desc = usa.election.1936.16.d
	picture = california

	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 5 }

	trigger = {
		tag = USA
		has_country_flag = USA_garner_west
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.16.a
		set_country_flag = { flag = USA_garner_west_poor value = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_garner_choice value > 1 }
					}
				}
			country_event = { id = usa.election.1936.20 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_garner_choice value > 1 }
				}
			set_country_flag = USA_election_1936_started
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.16.b
		set_country_flag = { flag = USA_garner_west_middle value = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_garner_choice value > 1 }
					}
				}
			country_event = { id = usa.election.1936.20 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_garner_choice value > 1 }
				}
			set_country_flag = USA_election_1936_started
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		name = usa.election.1936.16.c
		set_country_flag = { flag = USA_garner_west_rich value = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_garner_choice value > 1 }
					}
				}
			country_event = { id = usa.election.1936.20 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_garner_choice value > 1 }
				}
			set_country_flag = USA_election_1936_started
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

## long new state ##

country_event = {
	id = usa.election.1936.26
	title = usa.election.1936.26.t
	desc = usa.election.1936.26.d
	picture = congress

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_long_choice value = 1 }
	}

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		trigger = {
				USA = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = USA_long_west
						}
					}
			}
		name = usa.election.1936.26.a
		set_country_flag = USA_long_west
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		trigger = {
				USA = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = USA_long_north_central
						}
					}
			}
		name = usa.election.1936.26.b
		set_country_flag = USA_long_north_central
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		trigger = {
				USA = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = USA_long_southeast
						}
					}
			}
		name = usa.election.1936.26.c
		set_country_flag = USA_long_southeast
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		trigger = {
				USA = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = USA_long_northeast
						}
					}
			}

		name = usa.election.1936.26.e
		set_country_flag = USA_long_northeast
	}
}

### EVENTS TO DETERMINE WINNER
country_event = {
	id = usa.election.1936.31
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = {
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value > 99 } }
			modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value = -100 }
			country_event = usa.election.1936.32
			break = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value > 79 } }
			modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value = -80 }
			country_event = usa.election.1936.32
			break = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value > 59 } }
			modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value = -60 }
			country_event = usa.election.1936.32
			break = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value > 39 } }
			modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value = -40 }
			country_event = usa.election.1936.32
			break = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value > 19 } }
			modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value = -20 }
			country_event = usa.election.1936.32
			break = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value > 9 } }
			modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value = -10 }
			country_event = usa.election.1936.32
			break = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value > 7 } }
			modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value = -8 }
			country_event = usa.election.1936.32
			break = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value > 5 } }
			modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value = -6 }
			country_event = usa.election.1936.32
			break = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value > 3 } }
			modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value = -4 }
			country_event = usa.election.1936.32
			break = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value > 1 } }
			modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value = -2 }
			country_event = usa.election.1936.32
			break = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value > 0 } }
			modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value = -1 }
			country_event = usa.election.1936.32
			break = yes
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = usa.election.1936.32
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value > 0 }
				has_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value > 0 }
			}
			country_event = usa.election.1936.33
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value > 0 }
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value < 1 }
					}
					set_country_flag = USA_republican_won
					country_event = { id = usa.election.1936.35 hours = 1 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value < 1 }
								has_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value > 0 }
							}
							set_country_flag = USA_democrat_won
							country_event = { id = usa.election.1936.35 hours = 1 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										has_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value < 1 }
										has_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value < 1 }
									}
									set_country_flag = USA_draw
									country_event = { id = usa.election.1936.35 hours = 1 }
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = usa.election.1936.33
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = {
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value > 99 } }
			modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value = -100 }
			country_event = usa.election.1936.34
			break = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value > 79 } }
			modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value = -80 }
			country_event = usa.election.1936.34
			break = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value > 59 } }
			modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value = -60 }
			country_event = usa.election.1936.34
			break = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value > 39 } }
			modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value = -40 }
			country_event = usa.election.1936.34
			break = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value > 19 } }
			modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value = -20 }
			country_event = usa.election.1936.34
			break = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value > 9 } }
			modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value = -10 }
			country_event = usa.election.1936.34
			break = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value > 7 } }
			modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value = -8 }
			country_event = usa.election.1936.34
			break = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value > 5 } }
			modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value = -6 }
			country_event = usa.election.1936.34
			break = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value > 3 } }
			modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value = -4 }
			country_event = usa.election.1936.34
			break = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value > 1 } }
			modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value = -2 }
			country_event = usa.election.1936.34
			break = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value > 0 } }
			modify_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value = -1 }
			country_event = usa.election.1936.34
			break = yes
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = usa.election.1936.34
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value > 0 }
				has_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value > 0 }
			}
			country_event = usa.election.1936.31
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value > 0 }
						has_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value < 1 }
					}
					set_country_flag = USA_republican_won
					country_event = { id = usa.election.1936.35 hours = 1 }
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value < 1 }
								has_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value > 0 }
							}
							set_country_flag = USA_democrat_won
							country_event = { id = usa.election.1936.35 hours = 1 }
							else = {
								if = {
									limit = {
										has_country_flag = { flag = USA_republican_electoral_votes value < 1 }
										has_country_flag = { flag = USA_democrat_electoral_votes value < 1 }
									}
									set_country_flag = USA_draw
									country_event = { id = usa.election.1936.35 hours = 1 }
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

### SUMMARY EVENT
country_event = {
	id = usa.election.1936.35
	title = usa.election.1936.35.t
	desc = usa.election.1936.35.d
	picture = congress
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = USA_republican_won }
			if = { limit = { has_country_flag = USA_landon } custom_effect_tooltip = usa.election.1936.35.landon }
			if = { limit = { has_country_flag = USA_roosevelt } custom_effect_tooltip = usa.election.1936.35.roosevelt }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = USA_democrat_won }
			if = { limit = { has_country_flag = USA_garner } custom_effect_tooltip = usa.election.1936.35.garner }
			if = { limit = { has_country_flag = USA_long } custom_effect_tooltip = usa.election.1936.35.long }
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = usa.election.1936.35.won
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = USA_landon }
			custom_effect_tooltip = usa.election.1936.35.landon
			custom_effect_tooltip = usa.election.1936.35.colonnewline
			if = { limit = { has_country_flag = USA_landon_won_new_york } custom_effect_tooltip = usa.election.1936.35.new_york }
			if = { limit = { has_country_flag = USA_landon_won_pennsylvania } custom_effect_tooltip = usa.election.1936.35.pennsylvania }
			if = { limit = { has_country_flag = USA_landon_won_illinois } custom_effect_tooltip = usa.election.1936.35.illinois }
			if = { limit = { has_country_flag = USA_landon_won_ohio } custom_effect_tooltip = usa.election.1936.35.ohio }
